extendedInfo.description: Turn your iPhone or iPod into a wireless Joystick ,fully functional mouse,keyboard,play the game "Need For Speed" .Tested:Need for speed 6Need for speed 9Need for speed 12Not just a remote mouse,more function coming,This app(new version) is able to control the car\helicopter models after you connect the transmitter to the audio jack of iPod touch or iPhone. Features:- Accelerometer based mouse controller- Trackpad(full screen vertical and landscape modes)- Ability to hide keyboard (shake to hide/show)- Landscape keyboard (shake in landscape mode to show)- Presentation mode with Pro option (Keynote/Powerpoint)- Numeric keyboard- Application notifications- Remote keyboard with function and arrow keys- Scroll pad- Left and Right mouse buttons- Modifier Keys- On screen typing- Custom sensitivity settings- Supports Bonjour or static IP- No screen size limitation. Works with multiple monitors.- High resolution graphics for retina display on iPhone 4.- And much, much more.Requirements:- Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7 (32/64bit)- WIFI router (works best on a local area network or Ad hoc network)- Server Software** BEFORE YOU RUN THE SOFTWARE ** you will need to download the server application from :http://www.phonegamesoftware.cn** IMPORTANT ** IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS AT ALL, PLEASE CHECK THE TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION ON OUR SITE, THEN USE THE CONTACT FORM ON OUR SITE IF YOU ARE STILL HAVING PROBLEMS. We can not respond to reviews, so posting your questions there will not get you an answer. None of the reviewers saying that our app doesn't work ever contacted us for help. If you are unable to get the app to connect, contact us and WE WILL GET IT WORKING FOR YOU.Visit our site for video and setup instructions.
